button.autocapitalize: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.
button.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
button.form: Associates the control with a form element
button.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
button.popovertarget: Designates an <input type="button"> as a control for a popover element
button.popovertargetaction: Specifies the action that a popover control should perform
button.value: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value

checkbox.autocapitalize: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.
checkbox.checked: Whether the command or control is checked
checkbox.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
checkbox.form: Associates the control with a form element
checkbox.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
checkbox.required: Boolean. A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable
checkbox.value: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value

color.autocapitalize: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.
color.colorspace: The color space that should be used for selecting the color value
color.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
color.form: Associates the control with a form element
color.list: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options
color.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
color.value: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value

date.autocapitalize: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.
date.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
date.form: Associates the control with a form element
date.list: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options
date.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
date.readonly: Boolean. The value is not editable
date.required: Boolean. A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable
date.value: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value

email.dirname: Name of form field to use for sending the element's directionality in form submission
email.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
email.form: Associates the control with a form element
email.list: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options
email.maxlength: Maximum length (number of characters) of value
email.minlength: Minimum length (number of characters) of value
email.multiple: Boolean. Whether to allow multiple values
email.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
email.pattern: Pattern the value must match to be valid
email.placeholder: Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set
email.readonly: Boolean. The value is not editable
email.required: Boolean. A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable
email.value: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value

file.accept: Hint for expected file type in file upload controls
file.autocapitalize: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.
file.capture: Media capture input method in file upload controls
file.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
file.form: Associates the control with a form element
file.list: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options
file.multiple: Boolean. Whether to allow multiple values
file.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
file.readonly: Boolean. The value is not editable
file.required: Boolean. A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable
file.value: The value of the control. When specified in the HTML, corresponds to the initial value

image.alt: alt attribute for the image type. Required for accessibility
image.autocapitalize: Controls automatic capitalization in inputted text.
image.disabled: Whether the form control is disabled
image.form: Associates the control with a form element
image.formaction: URL to use for form submission
image.formenctype: Form data set encoding type to use for form submission
image.formmethod: HTTP method to use for form submission
image.formnovalidate: Bypass form control validation for form submission
image.height: Same as height attribute for ; vertical dimension
image.list: Value of the id attribute of the <datalist> of autocomplete options
image.name: Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair
image.readonly: Boolean. The value is not editable
image.required: Boolean. A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable
image.src: Same as src attribute for ; address of image resource
